product.title: InsCrazy Cordless Charging Portable Hair Dryer High-Power Fast Drying Negative Ionic Hair Dryer For Home Salon Travel
product.product_id: InsCrazy Cordless Charging Portable Hair Dryer Ionic Travel
product.description:
Wireless Charging Portable Hair Dryer High-Power Home Quick-Dry Hair Dryer Hair Salon Negative Protection Hair Dryer
Features:
This hair dryer has a mesh back cover to your hair from being inhaled.Moreover, this small, lightweight but powerful hair dryer handle conforms to the ergonomic principle, which can help you avoid arm cramps when drying your hair.
This ionic hair dryer can reduce frizz and enhance with negative technology, making you charming and confident all day long. The compact and lightweight design of this product is easy to use and carry, which does not space and can be used as a travel hair dryer.
Our ionic hair dryer has uniform heat distribution, large heating area and uniform heat. The ionic hair dryer with high rotating speed and high torque can quickly dry your hair. The design of constant temperature can avoid hair damage and provide the care for your hair.
The blow dryer can adjust the wind speed at will to meet your different wind speed needs This hair dryer is equipped with concentrator and diffuser to meet your various hair style needs, which allows you to make shapes at home easily.
You can easily use it with your family and enjoy the perfect experience brought by the blow dryer with diffuser.
Product Description:
1* Hair Dryer
